src_original: evaṃ triḥ vadet /  tathaiva ācāryābhāve 'pi svayaṃ bodhicittotpādavidhiḥ- tathāgataśākyamuniṃ daśadiksarvatathāgatāṃśca  manasā vicintya vandanā-pūjādividhiṃ ca kṛtvā adhyeṣaṇāsahitamācāryapadavirahitaśaraṇagamanādikramaṃ
evaṃ utpannacittaḥ pudgalaḥ bodhicittavṛddhyartha antaśo divā trivāraṃ rātrau ca trivāraṃ-
buddhaṃ ca dharmañca gaṇottamaṃ ca yāvaddhi bodhiṃ śaraṇaṃ gato 'smi /
dānādikṛtyaiśca kṛtairmayaibhiḥ buddho bhaveyaṃ jagato hitāya // 3 //
pareṣu akaukṛtyasthānīyeṣu kaukṛtyopādanam,  utpannacittebhyo bodhisattvebhyo dveṣeṇa avarṇabhāṣaṇam,  sarvasattveṣu māyāśāṭhyācaraṇañca /  bodhicittāvyāghātakān caturdharmān śikṣeta /

jīvitasyāpi hetoḥ prajānan amṛṣāvādam,  sarvasattveṣu adhyāśayaviśuddhyā sthitiḥ na māyāśāṭhyena,  utpannacitteṣu bodhisattveṣu  śāstṛsaṃjñāmutpādya daśasu dikṣu samyagguṇākhyānam,  ye sattvāḥ kuśale sthāpitāḥ teṣām anuttarasamyaksambodhau sthāpanaṃ na tu śrāvakapratyekabuddhatveṣviti /
